description: Details required by condition 3 (Submission of details - (d) proposed external french doors, fanlight and brick header to the eastern side of the rear terrace;) of listed building consent 21/03597 (Listed building consent to accompany a minor material amendment application to approved planning application PP/08/00537 to allow: correction of roof plan inconsistencies; realignment of skylight; reduction in lower basement area; lowering of part of basement by 0.35m; provision of additional door onto terrace; omission of approved north entrance to approved east extension; replacement of approved glass panels with brick; additional internal alterations and reconfiguration.)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
